synopsis.text: Kouichi is leading a normal life as a student, unaware of his incredible heritage - he is the reincarnation of an ancient and powerful alien protector who once came to Earth to defend humanity. When Kouichi learns of his true identity, he embraces his destiny to battle the forces that seek to destroy the planet he calls home. He joins together with three loyal and gifted allies: Ropros, an awe-inspiring dragon; Roden, a formidable shape-shifter; and Poseidon, a robot with awesome abilities. Kouichi and his team courageously oppose the malevolent cult leader Yomi, who will stop at nothing in his ruthless quest for global domination. This ultimate fight between good and evil takes Kouichi and the defenders across the globe on thrilling missions to counter Yomi's dark objectives. With the stakes higher than ever, Kouichi must tap into his psychic talents and prove that he has what it takes to live up to his extraterrestrial legacy. The future of Earth hangs in the balance!
